original_text: And so it was, when the cloud was a few days upon the tabernacle; according to the commandment of the Lord they abode in their tents, and according to the commandment of the Lord they journeyed.
korean_text: 혹시 구름이 성막 위에 머무는 날이 적을 때에도 그들이 다만 여호와의 명령을 따라 진영에 머물고 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하였으며

sentences.original_text: when the cloud was a few days upon the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 구름이 성막 위에 며칠 동안 머물러 있을 때

sentences.original_text: according to the commandment of the Lord
and according to the commandment of the Lord
